Title: Extends the credit for rehabilitation of historic properties
Summary: Extends the credit for rehabilitation of historic properties until 2032; adds an annual reporting requirement.
LawCode: Amd §§210-B, 606 & 1511, Tax L; amd §14.05, Pks & Rec L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law and the parks, recreation and historic preservation law, in relation to extending the credit for rehabilitation of historic properties
